text: Sodium arsenite is a chemical compound. Its chemical formula is NaAsO2. It has sodium and arsenite ions in it. ==Properties== Sodium arsenite is a colorless solid. It is highly toxic and carcinogenic. ==Preparation== Sodium arsenite is made by reacting sodium hydroxide with arsenic trioxide. ==Related pages== *Lead arsenate *Aluminium arsenide *Sodium phosphite Category:Sodium compounds Category:Arsenic compounds
title: Sodium arsenite
